      • getSlotForTask

        public SimpleSlot getSlotForTask(ExecutionVertex vertex)
        Gets a slot suitable for the given task vertex. This method will prefer slots that are local (with respect to ExecutionVertex.getPreferredLocations()), but will return non local slots if no local slot is available. The method returns null, when no slot is available for the given JobVertexID at all.
        Parameters:
        vertex -
        Returns:
        A task vertex for a task with the given JobVertexID, or null, if none is available.
